<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs=""
>
[Greater Snow Step](/Feats.aspx?ID=4103) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 185 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Gelid Shard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=201)

</column>

---

You can't be impeded by [environmental effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=590) that rely on cold or its byproducts. You ignore greater difficult terrain caused by snow and ice.
name: Greater Snow Step
